verses.verse: And <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>; for all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> to make him <S%H4427>king<s%>.

And it came to <S%H3379>pass<s%>, when Jeroboam the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of <S%H4714>it<s%>, (for he was in Egypt, whither he had <S%H1272>fled<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>,) that <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And they <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3379>him<s%>; and Jeroboam and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>, and they <S%H1696>spake<s%> to <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> took <S%H3289>counsel<s%> with the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H5975>men<s%>, that had stood <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> while he yet <S%H2416>lived<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H349>What<s%> counsel <S%H3289>give<s%> ye me to <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H1697>answer<s%> to this <S%H5971>people<s%>?

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3289>them<s%>, What counsel give <S%H7725>ye<s%>, that we may return <S%H1697>answer<s%> to this <S%H5971>people<s%>, who have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H559>me<s%>, saying, Make the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> that thy <S%H1>father<s%> did <S%H5414>put<s%> upon us <S%H7043>lighter<s%>?

And the young <S%H3206>men<s%> that were grown <S%H1431>up<s%> with him <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H559>him<s%>, saying, Thus shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H559>thee<s%>, saying, Thy <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3513>made<s%> our <S%H5923>yoke<s%> <S%H3513>heavy<s%>, but make thou it <S%H7043>lighter<s%> unto <S%H559>us<s%>; thus shalt thou say unto <S%H6995>them<s%>, My little finger is <S%H5666>thicker<s%> than my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H4975>loins<s%>.

And now <S%H6258>whereas<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> did <S%H6006>lade<s%> you with a <S%H3515>heavy<s%> <S%H5923>yoke<s%>, I will <S%H3254>add<s%> to your <S%H5923>yoke<s%>: my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3256>chastised<s%> you with <S%H7752>whips<s%>, but I will chastise you with <S%H6137>scorpions<s%>.

So <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, as the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1696>bade<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Come to me <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.
And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> them <S%H7186>roughly<s%>; and <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the old <S%H2205>men<s%>,

and <S%H1696>spake<s%> to them after the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the young <S%H3206>men<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, My <S%H1>father<s%> made your <S%H5923>yoke<s%> <S%H3513>heavy<s%>, but I will <S%H3254>add<s%> <S%H1>thereto<s%>: my father <S%H3256>chastised<s%> you with <S%H7752>whips<s%>, but I will chastise you with <S%H6137>scorpions<s%>.

So the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>; for it was <S%H5252>brought<s%> about of <S%H430>God<s%>, that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> might <S%H6965>establish<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%>, which he <S%H1696>spake<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H281>Ahijah<s%> the <S%H7888>Shilonite<s%> to <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat<s%>.

And when all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not unto <S%H5971>them<s%>, the people <S%H7725>answered<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What <S%H2506>portion<s%> have we in <S%H1732>David<s%>? neither have we <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> in the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%>: every <S%H376>man<s%> to your <S%H168>tents<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: now <S%H7200>see<s%> to thine own <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H1732>David<s%>. So all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%> unto their <S%H168>tents<s%>.
But as for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> reigned over <S%H4427>them<s%>.

Then <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H1913>Hadoram<s%>, who was over the men subject to <S%H4522>taskwork<s%>; and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7275>stoned<s%> him to <S%H4191>death<s%> with <S%H68>stones<s%>. And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> made <S%H553>speed<s%> to get him <S%H5927>up<s%> to his <S%H4818>chariot<s%>, to <S%H5127>flee<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
So <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6586>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
